item.title: Smelting, only work if have the item help 562 r2hd
item.dc:creator: @al_sk8r al sk8r
item.description:
@al_sk8r wrote:

ok i go this from my 317 sever im pretty sure it will work hope it works its for copper

case 436: // copper ore
if (IsItemInBag(438) == true) {
smelting[0] = 1;
smelting[1] = 1;
if (misc.random(2) == 1) {
smelting[2] = 6;
} else {
smelting[2] = 7;
}
smelting[3] = 2349;
} else {
sendMessage(
“You need 1 copper ore and 1 tin ore to smelt 1 bronze bar.”);
return false;
}
break;

item.title: Smelting, only work if have the item help 562 r2hd
item.dc:creator: @stevenlin598 stevenlin598
item.description:
@stevenlin598 wrote:

I’ve tried to make it so that you can only ores. But it comes out as it gives you a bar if you have the ore or not. But if you have the ore, it will delete the ore and and give you a bar. Does anybody know how to fix this?

This is my code:
case 2966://smithing ore
player.getInventory().deleteItem(436, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(2350, 1);
break;

Thanks in advance

Read full topic
